info.name: Twitch Purple
info.description:
[WONT BE UPDATED IN THE FUTURE]
A Twitch Skin which runs off of BTTV's Dark mode, changing it from the ugly grey to a dark purple theme.
info.additionalInfo:
Updated 1st August 2017:
- Support for Twitch's Vertical Navigation

Updated 29th April 2017:
- Fixed White bar below the player.

Update 4th April 2017:
- Added support for Twitch's product pages

Update 26th March 2017:
- Added support for new Twitch layout

Update 13th March 2017:
- Added support for Notification Center

Update 9th March 2017:
- Resolved and Updated skin to only work on twitch.tv and not globally.

Update March 2017:
- Added support for Notifications
